allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix multiple bugs and add missing configurations

- Fix Settings::updateOrCreate missing ''group'' field in UpdateService and SettingsController
- Fix role inconsistency: ''collector'' changed to ''penagih'' in CollectorReportExport and PaymentController
- Add missing getIdentity\(\) and getResources\(\) methods to MikrotikService
- Fix namespace imports in DebtIsolationService and RouterController
- Fix settlement_amount column to expected_amount in SettlementController
- Fix User->customers\(\) to User->assignedCustomers\(\) in ReportService
- Add missing config files: cors, filesystems, hashing, mail, sanctum, services, view
- Add migrations for missing customer fields and routers.last_sync_at
- Update Customer model with payment_behavior, last_payment_date, connection_type, static_ip
- Fix vite.config.js to include CSS in build
- Update installation docs with correct login credentials

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
